channel.title: rant on Ramblings of a cloud engineer
channel.description: Recent content in rant on Ramblings of a cloud engineer

item.title: Images on older posts
item.description: Hi folks. Just a quick headsup, that older posts and images, may have been lost unfortunately, because I made the terrible mistake, when I migrated over from my old blog, that I forgot to download all the images from the remote host. For lack of options, I deleted the images. :/ Sorry for the inconvencience! Gergely.
